testcase.name: Different Evaluation Assertion Processing
testcase.description: Assess that processors evaluate assertions only for "different fact-variable evaluations" (where fact variables differ) or for all evaluations (regardless of whether it is general variables that differ or fact variables that differ).

variation.name: Consistency check a = b * c, strict, reported valid a, evaluated ok, 4 total evaluations
variation.description: Consistency check valid a = b * c. Evaluates consistently. There are two "different fact-variable evaluations" but four total evaluations, four facts are produced. General variable differs (for the non-"different" evaluations)

variation.name: Consistency check a = b * c, strict, reported valid a, evaluated ok, 2 "different fact-variable evaluations"
variation.description: Same files as V-01 but assertion count reflects only "different fact-variable evaluations" are expected.

variation.name: Existence check, no fact variables, general variable counts contexts
variation.description: General variable differs (considered non-different evaluations) for 6 contexts

variation.name: Existence check, no fact variables, general variable "different fact-variable evaluations" (only 1)
variation.description: General variable differs but only 1 context is counted as a "different fact-variable evaluation"

variation.name: Value check a = b * c, strict, reported valid a, evaluated ok, 4 total evaluations
variation.description: Value check valid a = b * c. Evaluates consistently. There are two "different fact-variable evaluations" but four total evaluations. General variable differs (for the non-different evaluations)

variation.name: Value check a = b * c, strict, reported valid a, evaluated ok, 2 "different fact-variable evaluations"
variation.description: Same files as V-01 but assertion count reflects only "different fact-variable evaluations" are expected.

variation.name: Value assertion, no fact variables, general variable tests contexts, expect all evaluations
variation.description: General variable differs (considered non-different evaluations) for 6 contexts

variation.name: Value check, no fact variables, general variable "different fact-variable evaluations" (only 1)
variation.description: General variable differs but only 1 context is counted as a "different fact-variable evaluations"
